Text.Page:
We're having trouble pushing forward, but we can't move backward at this point. They're gathering forces, and if we turn, they'll just destroy us from behind.

Whimnia is convinced that {@LinkCreature:6#3031#Lokian reavers} and {@LinkCreature:6#3032#mystics} are in the base.

I need you to go find out if that's true—and if it is, I need you to make it not be true anymore—if you're picking up what I'm putting down.
Great, thanks. You've given us a chance to regroup.
